INSAT-3D is an advanced meteorological satellite developed by ISRO.
It monitors cyclones and cloud patterns.
It carries a 6-channel imager and a 19-channel sounder.
INSAT-3D is launched by PSLV.
INSAT-3D supports disaster warning systems.
INSAT-3DR is the follow-up satellite to INSAT-3D.
INSAT-3DR was launched by GSLV-F05.
